content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Duisburg to be a great place to live. Let's discuss the rental price and find a solution that meets both our needs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, the market price for this apartment is €900 per month. However, I am a reasonable person. I could offer you a price of €850 per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I hear your offer, but I must consider the location and amenities of the apartment. Could you possibly increase your offer to reflect the value of the property?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. The apartment is in the city center and close to all important facilities. I am willing to go as high as €875 per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of €875 is more in line with the value of the apartment. However, I am still looking for a price that reflects the premium location and new construction. Could you perhaps offer a bit more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I want to be fair with you, Yi-Nuo. I am willing to offer €888 per month. This is the lowest price I can offer. The apartment is already very reasonably priced for its location and condition.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of €888 is appreciated, but I'm afraid it's still not quite what I'm looking for. The apartment's central location and modern amenities justify a higher price. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at €900 per month? This would be a fair deal for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your understanding. I agree to the price of [900] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. The apartment will be yours at €900 per month. Please let me know when you're ready to sign the lease. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
